Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I've had several biopsies and removal of suspicious lumps. I'm tired of getting chopped on and have a shadow on my mammogram. I'm thinking of getting the Oncoblot test. Has anyone done this and what is your experience? It's supposed to be a definitive yes or no re cancer and finds it 8-10 years before it shows up on other tests. http://oncoblotlabs.com/ " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://oncoblotlabs.com/ http://oncoblotlabs.com/ " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://oncoblotlabs.com/ http://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007%2F978-1-4614-3958-5 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3901999/
Posts.Title: Oncoblot
